org_midgardproject_projectsite_document.title: Datagard
org_midgardproject_projectsite_document.content: <div><p>Datagard is the command-line tool for managing Midgard installations. After you have installed the Midgard1 packages on your system you can use it for setting up the Midgard environment.</p></div><div><p>Basic and easiest setup can be done by just running <i>datagard</i> command. Datagard will ask you questions, and guide you step by step through setup process.</p><p>Datagard will do the following operations for you:</p><ul><li>Set up a Midgard1 MySQL database</li><li>Create a new Apache virtual host to be used with Midgard</li><li>Install and set up a MidCOM environment</li></ul></div>
